description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任第79集团军军长、国防大学联合作战学院院长、中部战区副司令员等职。2022年晋升中将，2023年降为少将。
description.en: A general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who has served as commander of the 79th Group Army, president of the Joint Operations College of the National Defense University, and deputy commander of the Central Theater Command. He was promoted to lieutenant general in 2022 and demoted to major general in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军衔等级，相当于中华民国国军少将、美国陆军少将。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army of China, equivalent to Major General in the Republic of China Armed Forces and the United States Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军衔等级，位于上将之下、少将之上。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army of China, ranking below General (Shang Jiang) and above Major General (Shao Jiang).

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾在中国山东省济南市设立的一个大军区，现已撤销。
description.en: A former military region of the People's Liberation Army, located in Jinan, Shandong Province, China, which has now been disbanded.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国军事人物，曾任中国共产党中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: A military figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第五十四集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第五十四集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一个集团军，现已撤销。
description.en: A former group army of the PLA Ground Force, which has now been disbanded.

description.en: A former group army of the PLA Ground Force, which has now been disbanded.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十七集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一个集团军。
description.en: A group army of the PLA Ground Force.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十九集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一个集团军。
description.en: A group army of the PLA Ground Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防大学联合作战学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学联合作战学院
国防大学联合作战学院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学的下属学院。
description.en: A college subordinate to the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的战区之一。
description.en: One of the theater commands of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任西部战区司令员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as the commander of the Western Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 霍建刚是河南固始人。
description.en: Huo Jian'gang is a native of Gushi, Henan.

description.zh-cn: 霍建刚曾任济南军区司令部办公室主任。
description.en: Huo Jian'gang once served as the Director of the Headquarters Office of the Jinan Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 霍建刚任济南军区司令部办公室主任时，时任司令员为范长龙。
description.en: When Huo Jian'gang was the Director of the Headquarters Office of the Jinan Military Region, Fan Changlong was the commander.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第五十四集团军

description.zh-cn: 2015年，霍建刚任陆军第五十四集团军第127师师长。
description.en: In 2015, Huo Jian'gang served as the commander of the 127th Division of the 54th Group Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第四十七集团军

description.zh-cn: 霍建刚曾任陆军第四十七集团军副军长。
description.en: Huo Jian'gang once served as the Deputy Commander of the 47th Group Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十七集团军

description.zh-cn: 2017年3月，霍建刚任陆军第七十七集团军副军长。
description.en: In March 2017, Huo Jian'gang was appointed Deputy Commander of the 77th Group Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十九集团军

description.zh-cn: 2019年4月，霍建刚升任第七十九集团军军长。
description.en: In April 2019, Huo Jian'gang was promoted to Commander of the 79th Group Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防大学联合作战学院

description.zh-cn: 2021年，霍建刚改任国防大学联合作战学院院长。
description.en: In 2021, Huo Jian'gang was reassigned as the President of the Joint Operations College of the National Defense University.

description.zh-cn: 2022年6月，霍建刚升任中部战区副司令员。
description.en: In June 2022, Huo Jian'gang was promoted to Deputy Commander of the Central Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 霍建刚于2017年7月晋升少将军衔，2023年由中将降为少将军衔。
description.en: Huo Jian'gang was promoted to the rank of Major General in July 2017, and was demoted from Lieutenant General back to Major General in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 霍建刚于2022年6月晋升中将军衔。
description.en: Huo Jian'gang was promoted to the rank of Lieutenant General in June 2022.

description.zh-cn: 霍建刚接替徐起零出任中国人民解放军陆军第七十九集团军军长。
description.en: Huo Jian'gang succeeded Xu Qiling as the commander of the 79th Group Army of the PLA Ground Force.
